text: Siri Graff Leknes is a Norwegian neuroscientist and Professor (Chair) of Neuroscience at the University of Oslo, where she directs the Leknes Affective Brain Lab, which is funded by a European Research Council grant.Siri Leknes, University of OsloTi norske forskere har fått prestisjetungt EU-stipend [Ten Norwegian scientists receive prestigious EU grant], Khrono She earned her PhD in neuroscience at the University of Oxford in 2008 with the dissertation Pain, Pleasure and Relief. After postdoctoral fellowships in Gothenburg and Oslo, she joined Oslo University Hospital as a senior researcher. In 2014 she was appointed full Professor of Neuroscience at the University of Oslo. According to Google Scholar, she has been cited over 2,000 times in scientific literature.Siri Leknes, Google Scholar ==References== Category:Norwegian psychologists Category:Norwegian neuroscientists Category:University of Oslo faculty Category:Norwegian women neuroscientists Category:21st-century Norwegian scientists Category:21st-century women scientists Category:Living people Category:Norwegian expatriates in England Category:Norwegian expatriates in Sweden Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
